title: Raise registry error when the remote server failed to provide the requested resource.

body:
### What are you trying to accomplish?

Raise registry error when the remote server failed to provide the requested resource.

### Anything you want to highlight for special attention from reviewers?

As there is no status from npm response, So I have extracted error from the response message.

### How will you know you've accomplished your goal?

Ran cli against the repo https://github.com/dsp-testing/security-update-error

```
2025/02/05 00:28:13 INFO Handled error whilst updating serve-static: registry_error {:status=>404, :msg=>"The remote server failed to provide the requested resource"}

...

Dependabot encountered '1' error(s) during execution, please check the logs for more details.
+-------------------------------+
| Dependencies failed to update |
+--------------+----------------+
| serve-static | registry_error |
+--------------+----------------+
```

### Checklist

- [x] I have thoroughly tested my code changes to ensure they work as expected, including adding additional tests for new functionality.
- [x] I have written clear and descriptive commit messages.
- [x] I have provided a detailed description of the changes in the pull request, including the problem it addresses, how it fixes the problem, and any relevant details about the implementation.
- [x] I have ensured that the code is well-documented and easy to understand.
